document_data.name: Sea chips
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/For a Few Zhents More|7}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Sea chips''' was a seafood dish from [[Ravens Bluff]].
document_data.Description: Sea chips were made from [[cod]] that was pressed into small, flat pieces, then fried in [[oil]], not unlike [[frites]].
document_data.History: Sea chips were served to great acclaim at [[the Shark's Finn]] tavern in Ravens Bluff, alongside other seafood dishes such as cod stew and deviled [[crab]], thanks to the fugitive cook [[Caleni]].
